entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dolbeau-Mistassini
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:15 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.4°C

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
